{{See also|Mist Bubble (Exploration)}}
'''Floating Crates''' are small floating objects found in bodies of water. In [[Liyue]] they yield [[Geo Sigil]]s and [[Mora]] when [[Investigation|investigated]]. However, in [[Inazuma]], they only yield Mora. They count towards [[Map|exploration progress]].
